title: Have a question for you all.
body:
Why is it that people say "oh we need a tank" and someone does pick a tank...... you don't back him up
? And also why is it that people seem to give up so easily? Just curious.

replies.body:
I used to try out tank (support) with that mentality, then I led my team to demise, then back to Janna... :<

People (like me) realized they made mistakes in a game, so instead of attempting to redo, it's faster to just surrender. But as long as the game still goes, I don't slack off or afk just cuz :X
